Title: Silverlight Control Templates
Description: Replace the default look of Silverlight controls with animated templates.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Replace the default look of Silverlight controls with animated templates.

This project provides you with ready-to-use templates for your Silverlight projects.

See the samples for yourself.

It currently features templates for the following types of controls:
  • Button (5 templates: pen, accelerator, card reader, emergency button, sliding button)
  • ProgressBar (1 template: speed gauge)
You can expect this list to grow (see below).

All the templates are provided as XAML resource dictionnaries for easy inclusion in your projects. Those include the XAML source code.

Some background info
I build those templates as samples during my Silverlight trainings. My students choose an item in the room and I create it as a template.
As such, I should publish new templates frequently.

My Silverlight training
Silveright 4 training includes using Visual Studio 2010 and Expression Blend 4, and is available for developers, designers or project managers.
